name: Hexeptional Picture Puzzle
description:
Rebuild images that have been turned into hexagons.

Two game modes:

  1. Slide - The hexagons are shuffled and need to be moved to their correct position
  2. Rotate - The hexagons are in a wrong orientation and need to be rotated back
  4. More then 50 level
  5. Each picture comes with unique ambient sounds
  6. Use images from your files and create your own sound atmosphere
